lines.text: Don't let it fool you. You are in enemy country. Be alert. Suspicious of everyone. Take no chances.
The German lust for conquest is not dead. It's merely gone undercover.
They were brought up on straight propaganda.
Don't argue with them. Don't try to change their point of view.
You will not argue with them. You will not be friendly. You will be aloof. Watchful and suspicious. Every German is a potential source of trouble.
They cannot come back into the civilized fold just by sticking out their hand and saying, "I'm sorry". Don't clasp that hand. It's not the kind of a hand you can clasp in friendship.

the super-race disease, the world-conquest disease. But they must prove that they have been cured, beyond the shadow of a doubt, before they ever again are allowed to take their place among respectable nations.
